choices: both proper energy and proper orientation

question: Given the balanced equation representing a reaction, This reaction occurs more quickly when powdered iron is used instead of a single piece of iron of the same mass because the powdered iron

question: A catalyst lowers the activation energy of a reaction by

changing the mole ratio of the reactants

question: A catalyst is added to a system at equilibrium. If the temperature remains constant, the activation energy of the forward reaction

When an exothermic reaction occurs in a water solution, the temperature of the solution
choices: increases because energy is given off by the reaction
increases because energy is absorbed by the reaction
decreases because energy is given off by the reaction
decreases because energy is absorbed by the reaction

question: A student observed that the temperature of water increased when a salt was dissolved in it. The student should conclude that dissolving the salt was
choices: involved in the formation of an acidic solution
involved in the formation of a basic solution
